sentences.cn: “ brass ” 是 “ money ” 一词的俚语.

sentences.en: Archie liked to think he kept up with current slang.
sentences.cn: 阿奇喜欢那种紧跟潮流，讲满口时髦新词的感觉。

sentences.en: Can't you learn to cut out the slang?
sentences.cn: 你能费点儿心思,把土话扔掉 吗 ?

sentences.en: Here was a type of the travelling canvasser for a manufacturing house -- a class which at that time was first being dubbed by the slang of the day " drummers.
sentences.cn: ”这人是为生产厂家 推销 产品的旅行推销员,当时刚刚流行把这类人称作“皮包客. ”

sentences.en: However diligently Wilson practised, the slang phrase sounded unnaturally on his lips.
sentences.cn: 虽然威尔逊极力摹仿,当地人惯用的一些词语在他嘴里说得还是很不自然.

sentences.en: Slang had been a principal component of his rattling.
sentences.cn: 他唠叨的主要是一些假语村言.

sentences.en: Slang often goes in and out of fashion quickly.
sentences.cn: 俚语往往很快风行起来又很快不再风行了.

sentences.en: The manual is full of the jargon and slang of self-improvement courses.
sentences.cn: 手册里满是有关自修课程的行话术语。

sentences.en: The phrase is labelled as slang in the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 这个短语在这本字典里被注为俚语.

sentences.en: Their conversation was full of slang.
sentences.cn: 他们的谈话充满了俚语.

sentences.en: Their speech was slang phrases and flares of poetry.
sentences.cn: 在他们的谈吐中既有俚语也有美妙的诗句.

sentences.en: Their speeches were slang phrases and flares of poetry.
sentences.cn: 在他们的谈吐中,既有俚语,也有美妙的诗句.

sentences.en: They like his slang and his brag and his blunders.
sentences.cn: 他们很喜欢听他说土话,吹牛皮或胡说八道.

sentences.en: They were rich in curiosity, and strong in daring and slang.
sentences.cn: 他们富于好奇心, 敢于大胆说粗话.

sentences.en: We settled down to a quiet discussion of English slang.
sentences.cn: 我们安下心来讨论英语俚语的用法.

words.tran_cn: 俚语的；俗话多的；好用俚语的
隐语,黑话,土话,无意的闲谈

trans.tran_en: very informal, sometimes offensive language that is used especially by people who belong to a particular group, such as young people or criminals
